verses.verse: In the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the first <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech <S%H3087><s%>, the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus speaks <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This people <S%H5971><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, The time <S%H6256><s%> is not come <S%H935><s%>, the time <S%H6256><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> should be built <S%H1129><s%>.
Then came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Is it time <S%H6256><s%> for you <S%H3427><s%>, O you, to live in your paneled <S%H5603><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>, and this house <S%H1004><s%> lie waste <S%H2720><s%>?
Now therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Consider <S%H7760><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%>.

You have sown <S%H2232><s%> much <S%H7235><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> in little <S%H4592><s%>; you eat <S%H398><s%>, but you have not enough <S%H7654><s%>; you drink <S%H8354><s%>, but you are not filled with drink <S%H7937><s%>; you clothe <S%H3847><s%> yourself <S%H2527><s%>, but there is no one warm; and he that earns wages <S%H7936><s%> earns wages <S%H7936><s%> to put it into a bag <S%H6872><s%> with holes <S%H5344><s%>.
Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Consider <S%H7760><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%>.

Go up <S%H5927><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>; and I will take pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in it <S%H3513><s%>, and I will be glorified, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

You looked <S%H6437><s%> for much <S%H7235><s%>, and <S%H4592><s%>, behold, it came to little; and when you brought <S%H935><s%> it home <S%H1004><s%>, I did blow <S%H5301><s%> upon it <S%H5002><s%>. Why? says the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>. Because <S%H3282><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> that is waste <S%H2720><s%>, and you run <S%H7323><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his own house <S%H1004><s%>.
Therefore the heaven <S%H8064><s%> over you is stayed <S%H3607><s%> from dew <S%H2919><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> is stayed <S%H3607><s%> from her fruit <S%H2981><s%>.

And I called <S%H7121><s%> for a drought <S%H2721><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>, and upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and upon the corn <S%H1715><s%>, and upon the new wine <S%H8492><s%>, and upon the oil <S%H3323><s%>, and upon that which the ground <S%H127><s%> brings forth <S%H3318><s%>, and upon men <S%H120><s%>, and upon cattle <S%H929><s%>, and upon all the labor <S%H3018><s%> of the hands <S%H3709><s%>.

Then Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech <S%H3087><s%>, the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>, with all the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>, and the words <S%H1697><s%> of Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> him <S%H5971><s%>, and the people did fear <S%H3372><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Then spoke <S%H559><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s messenger <S%H4397><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s message <S%H4400><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I am with you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> stirred up <S%H5782><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech <S%H3087><s%>, the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of all the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; and they came <S%H935><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, their God <S%H430><s%>,

In the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.
